# windows

**Instance Property**

The windows associated with the scene.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var windows: [UIWindow] { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to retrieve the windows associated with the scene. To remove the window from the current scene, or move it to a different scene, change the value of the window’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIWindow/windowScene] property.

## Getting the active windows

- **keyWindow**: The key window associated with the scene.
- **screen**: The screen that displays the contents of the scene.
